1.text: We’re heading into a complex warehouse fire. Be prepared for various fire types and hazardous materials. Keep your wits about you.
1.name: Captain Hayes

2.text: Any more questions before we arrive?
2.name: Captain Hayes

5.text: Can you provide more details about the warehouse?
5.name: You

6.text: All I know about this warehouse is that some of the stairs are weak and might already be broken.
6.name: Captain Hayes

7.text: Additionally, things might start falling down, so be careful as you navigate the area.
7.name: Captain Hayes

8.text: We might need to find alternate ways to get up if we need to reach higher levels.
8.name: Captain Hayes

9.text: Any more questions before we arrive?
9.name: Captain Hayes

10.text: I noticed the sprinklers aren’t working. Shouldn’t they be activated automatically?
10.name: You

11.text: The sprinklers should indeed be working. It’s unusual that they’re not. Let’s stay alert.
11.name: Captain Hayes

12.text: (It seems like someone might have tampered with the valves. We’ll need to be extra vigilant.)
12.name: Captain Hayes

13.text: Any more questions before we arrive?
13.name: Captain Hayes

15.text: I found a piece of torn paper at the apartment fire. We might need to investigate this further.
15.name: You

16.text: A piece of torn paper? We need to focus on the fire at hand.
16.name: Captain Hayes

17.text: Let’s keep our attention on the current mission and deal with any potential evidence afterward.
17.name: Captain Hayes

18.text: Any more questions before we arrive?
18.name: Captain Hayes

20.text: Alright, let’s get moving. We’ll need to stay focused and handle this situation carefully.
20.name: Captain Hayes

21.text: I heard Burke might have arrived before us. His presence here could complicate things.
21.name: Captain Hayes
